title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.

OB: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

EB: When selecting an item in the library outline view, the selected item should be highlighted and the focus should remain on the selected item.

SR: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
3. Observe that the first selection attempt does not register and the focus jumps to the library file node.
4. Repeat the selection attempt, noting that subsequent attempts are successful.
